  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AnswerArea
    A node that prompts the user for answer (used when a sprite is asking).
    CostumeOption
    A costume option to be selected in costume tab of sprite editor.
    ResizeEditor
    A node that handle user direct update on sprite's position and size.
    SceneEditor
    The editor for SceneOption.
    SceneOption
    A scene option to be selected in SceneEditor.
    SpriteEditor
    The editor for SpriteOption.
    SpriteObject
    The sprite that will be rendered in stage.
    SpriteOption
    A option to be selected in sprite tab in SpriteEditor.
    StageArea
    The stage area: where all the main action take place.
    TopMenuBar
    The top menu bar responsible for handling file related actions (new, open, save, save as).
    VariableDisplay
    A node to display variable value.
    VariableDisplayList
    A list of multiple variable display that can be draggable.
